sentences.en: a member of the parochial church council
And politicians tend to favor parochial interests over sound economic sense.
sentences.cn: 政客们往往将狭隘的利益凌驾于可靠的经济意义之上.

sentences.en: He could bring out the universal element in the most parochial of issues.
sentences.cn: 他能在最狭隘的问题中揭示出普遍的要素.

sentences.en: He felt himself from disuse to be unfit for parochial duty.
sentences.cn: 他觉得自己由于长期不工作,已经不适合做教区的职务了.

sentences.en: He is rather too parochial in his outlook.
sentences.cn: 他的眼界未免过于狭隘了.

sentences.en: He is very interested in parochial affairs.
sentences.cn: 他对教区的事务非常感兴趣.

sentences.en: In comparison, the FA Cup seems a parochial affair , and something of, even to the winners.
sentences.cn: 相比之下, 足协杯好像成了降级成了地方性的赛事, 甚至其冠军身上的光环也渐渐退去.

sentences.en: Magnificently built churches are still the nucleus of parochial work.
sentences.cn: 教区工作的核心依旧是建造宏伟的教堂.

sentences.en: Officials tend to tilt toward secrecy from a parochial view of their responsibilities.
sentences.cn: 官吏出于狭隘的责任观念往往倾向于保密.

sentences.en: Officials tend to tilt toward secrecy parochial view of their responsibilities.
sentences.cn: 官吏出于狭隘的责任观念往往倾向于“保密”.

sentences.en: She was a secretary on the local parochial church council.
sentences.cn: 她是当地教区教会委员会的秘书。

sentences.en: The Congress is both riven by ideology and dominated by parochial concerns.
sentences.cn: 意识形态使得国会四分五裂,狭隘的关切主导了整个议会的进程.

sentences.en: The existing problems and development strategy of parochial chemical industries of Jiangsu Province are discussed.
sentences.cn: 介绍江苏乡镇化工的概况及存在的问题,提出发展江苏乡镇化工工业的思路和几点体会.

sentences.en: The old parochial outlook has become a world view.
sentences.cn: 昔日的那个地方范围的观点已成了一种世界范围的观点.

sentences.en: With tax administration's the proceeding informationization, it is probably parochial to limit it within taxation system.
sentences.cn: 随着税务信息化的发展, 仅将其停留在税务系统内部是狭隘的.

words.tran_cn: 偏狭，狭隘；教区制度；乡土观念；眼界狭小
教区的；狭小的；地方范围的

trans.tran_cn: 教区的，范围有限的，狭小的，狭隘的
trans.tran_en: relating to a particular church and the area around it
